title: [HOLD for payment 2024-08-09] [$250] Expense - Report turns to skeleton after deleting expense with comments offline
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com
2. Go to DM with any user that has no unsettled expense.
3. Submit an expense.
4. Click on the expense preview.
5. Send a few comments.
6. Go offline.
7. Click on the report header.
8. Click Delete expense.
9. Delete the expense.

Expected result: Report will not turn to skeleton after deleting the expense offline.

Actual result: None
